reqs:
**In order to remain registered in this class, all students must fulfill the First-Year English Course Entry Requirement by the published deadlines. For detailed information, please visit http://english.ubc.ca/first-year-english/frequently-asked-questions-faq/.
**No student may take two First-Year English courses at the same time.
*WAITING LIST FOR TERM 1*
**All students must fulfill the First-Year English Course Entry Requirement by the published deadlines. For detailed information, please visit http://www.english.ubc.ca/ugrad/1styear/faq.htm#1.
**No student may take two First-Year English courses at the same time.

description: Study of a selection of prose texts ranging in length from the essay to the book, with emphasis on writing of the twentieth century. Essays are required.
